thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com
thread.title: Donna Sandora
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Donna Sandora

author: Donna Sandora
title: Donna Sandora
text: Been using their Creme Abricot nail cream for decades. Ordered it by phone after ordering on the website would not take my state. Gave the rep all of my info including billing info. Got an email almost a week later saying the order was cancelled as it was not in stock. Both the website and the rep said it was in stock Something is wrong with the tech support for Dior. I have since moved on and tried a different product. It's not as good. DIOR, GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER. This sucked. And btw, I am divorced. I don't like that there is not a Ms title option. I am not a Miss or a Mrs.
